model.description: number of requests issued at once vs average response time for requests

targets.rawSql: SELECT bytes_downloaded / download_speed, crawl_id FROM response_info

model.title: Concurrent Requests vs Response Time

targets.rawSql: SELECT total_requests FROM crawl_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls
SELECT COUNT(request_id) FROM request_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls;

model.description: number of gigabytes downloaded in total for this crawl

targets.rawSql: SELECT bytes_downloaded FROM response_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls;

model.title: Gigabytes Downloaded

targets.rawSql: SELECT estimated_time_to_complete FROM crawl_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls;

model.description: Number of requests that were blocked for this crawl

targets.rawSql: SELECT is_blocked FROM response_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls AND is_blocked = 1;

model.title: Blocked Requests

targets.rawSql: SELECT website_status_code FROM response_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls;

model.description: Download speed over time for this crawl

targets.rawSql: SELECT download_speed, time FROM response_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls;

model.title: Download Speed Over Time

description: dashboard to view real time statistics on a crawling script

panels.description: total amount of gigabytes downloaded grouped by proxy
panels.title: GigaBytes Downloaded Per Proxy

panels.description: Total CPU utilization over time for this cluster

targets.rawSql: SELECT cpu_usage, time FROM node_info WHERE node_id IN (SELECT node_id FROM crawl_node WHERE crawl_id IN (SELECT crawl_id FROM crawl_info WHERE cluster_id = $Clusters));

panels.title: CPU

targets.rawSql: SELECT memory_usage, time FROM node_info WHERE node_id IN (SELECT node_id FROM crawl_node WHERE crawl_id IN (SELECT crawl_id FROM crawl_info WHERE cluster_id = $Clusters));
SELECT diskspace_usage, time FROM node_info WHERE node_id IN (SELECT node_id FROM crawl_node WHERE crawl_id IN (SELECT crawl_id FROM crawl_info WHERE cluster_id = $Clusters));
SELECT cpu_usage, time FROM node_info WHERE node_id IN (SELECT node_id FROM crawl_node WHERE crawl_id IN (SELECT crawl_id FROM crawl_info WHERE cluster_id = $Clusters));

panels.description: Amount of requests sent at one time for this crawl

targets.rawSql: SELECT concurrent_requests FROM crawl_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls

panels.title: Concurrent Requests

panels.description: count of responses received at each moment in time

targets.rawSql: SELECT response_id, time FROM response_info WHERE crawl_id = $Crawls;

panels.title: Number of Responses over Time

title: Crawling_Dashboard
